product_name: Gerber Fast Draw Serrated Locking Knife
long_description: The Fast Draw uses a patented, forward action spring technology (F.A.S.T.) to deploy blade quickly and confidently. Partially serrated blade is constructed of surgical stainless-steel for durability. Cross-bolt safety lock keeps blade securely in place. Hard, textured nylon handle ensures a firm grip. Stainless-steel pocket clip makes it easy to carry.
short_description: The Fast Draw uses a patented, forward action spring technology (F.A.S.T.) to deploy blade quickly and confidently.
